name: Golem (itch) (DeveloperDenis)
description:
You are a newly awakened golem rolling around a forest clearing. Pick up the magical artifacts scattered around the field to gain the power required to break through the log blocking access to the inner sanctuary!

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Press the space bar to interact
  • Use the mouse to move the camera

This is my first completed Unity project, so it's very basic and short! I used the "Low-Poly Nature Pack" by JustCreate from the Unity Asset Store for most of the models, the only major exception being the golem itself.
